DOC.brief_title: Follow Up Patients Treated With Radiotherapy

DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Radiation Oncology Branch investigator deem best interest patient NCI/ROB patient see followup ROB clinic . Patient able provide inform consent . Patient must primary physician community record appropriate followup management give . Social service enlist patient lack health insurance , etc . Patients receive radiotherapy ROB may may officially enter clinical protocol . Some patient treat prior 1993 may officially enter clinical protocol . Age great equal 18 year age EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Patients another active primary research protocol NIH .
